basic.Peptide Name: TsAP-1 (T. serrulatus antimicrobial peptide 1; scorpions, arachnids, invertebrates, animals)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.23770440] Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=120 μM, MBC>160 μM);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli(MIC=160 μM, MBC>160 μM);Fungi :Candida albicans(MIC=160 μM, MBC>160 μM)
